result.execSummary:
The defendant Danny E Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct - County Ordinance [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse]. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid in 90 days or penalty of 7 days jail for non-payment.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Danny E Robinson

records.addlTxt: File previously scanned and destroyed.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Danny E Robinson in court with Attorney Carl William Chesshir.  Shawn N Woller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moves to amend to county ordinance disorderly conduct.  Defendant enters a no contest plea to amended charge.  Court finds Defendant guilty of amended charge and imposes fine of $367.50 -to be paid in 90 days, alternate 7 days jail if not paid.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence. Witness list attached.
Jury trial - 12 person on November 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Jury status hearing on November 2, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Danny E Robinson in court with Attorney Carl William Chesshir.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern Shannon Tenney appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Chesshir requests a jury status and jury trial date.   Bail remains as fixed.  Jury status hearing scheduled for November 2, 2016 at 10:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for November 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 7, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Danny E Robinson in court with Attorney Carl William Chesshir.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Chesshir requests a plea and sentence date.  Court adjourns.    Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 7, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Hearing on May 2, 2016 at 09:30 am.

Case called at 9:15 a.m.  Attorney Carl William Chesshir in court.   Defendant Danny E Robinson did not appear.   Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Chesshir does not know why Defendant does not appear today.  State requests a capias.    Court ordered a capias stayed until next court date.  Hearing scheduled for May 2, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Hearing on April 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Danny E Robinson in court with Attorney Carl William Chesshir.  Andrea M Will appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Chesshir requests an adjournment to review offer with Defendant.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for April 25, 2016 at 08:30 am.
